statements: DELETE FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com' AND skills @> ARRAY['python', 'java'];
DELETE FROM candidate_resumes WHERE candidate_id = (SELECT id FROM candidate_profiles WHERE name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE full_name = 'John Doe' AND education = 'Bachelor's Degree';
DELETE FROM Resumes WHERE uploaded_date < '2021-01-01' AND file_path LIKE '%pdf%';
DELETE FROM candidate_resumes WHERE resume_id = 201 AND candidate_id = 101;
DELETE FROM candidate_skills WHERE candidate_id = 1 AND skill_id = 3;
